# iosxr_router_mld_vrf (Resource)

This resource can manage the Router MLD VRF configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_router_mld_vrf" "example" {
  vrf_name                               = "VRF1"
  robustness_variable                    = 5
  maximum_groups                         = 50000
  maximum_groups_per_interface           = 25000
  maximum_groups_per_interface_threshold = 20000
  maximum_groups_per_interface_acl       = "MLD_ACL"
  version                                = 2
  query_interval                         = 125
  query_timeout                          = 255
  query_max_response_time                = 10
  explicit_tracking                      = true
  explicit_tracking_acl                  = "MLD_ACL"
  access_group                           = "MLD_ACL"
  ssm_map_statics = [
    {
      address     = "2001:db8::1"
      access_list = "SSM_ACL"
    }
  ]
  ssm_map_query_dns             = true
  missed_packets_gen_query      = 5000
  missed_packets_grp_spec_query = 5000
  missed_packets_ssm_query      = 5000
  missed_packets_member_report  = 5000
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `vrf_name` (String) VRF configs

### Optional

- `access_group` (String) MLD group access group
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `explicit_tracking` (Boolean) MLD explicit host tracking
- `explicit_tracking_acl` (String) Access list specifying tracking group range
- `explicit_tracking_disable` (Boolean) Disable IGMPv3 explicit host tracking
- `maximum_groups` (Number) Maximum number of groups accepted by this router
  - Range: `1`-`75000`
- `maximum_groups_per_interface` (Number) Maximum number of groups accepted per interface by this router
  - Range: `1`-`40000`
- `maximum_groups_per_interface_acl` (String) Name of ACL
- `maximum_groups_per_interface_threshold` (Number) Threshold warning
  - Range: `1`-`40000`
- `missed_packets_gen_query` (Number) Maximum general query servicability entries
  - Range: `256`-`10000`
- `missed_packets_grp_spec_query` (Number) Maximum group-specific query servicability entries
  - Range: `256`-`10000`
- `missed_packets_member_report` (Number) Maximum membership servicability entries
  - Range: `256`-`10000`
- `missed_packets_ssm_query` (Number) Maximum ssm-query servicability entries
  - Range: `256`-`10000`
- `query_interval` (Number) MLD host query interval
  - Range: `1`-`3600`
- `query_max_response_time` (Number) MLD max query response value
  - Range: `1`-`25`
- `query_timeout` (Number) MLD previous querier timeout
  - Range: `60`-`300`
- `robustness_variable` (Number) MLD robustness variable
  - Range: `2`-`10`
- `ssm_map_query_dns` (Boolean) Configure a dns mapping for sources to a set of SSM groups
- `ssm_map_statics` (Attributes List) Configure a static mapping of a source to a set of SSM groups (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ssm_map_statics))
- `version` (Number) MLD version
  - Range: `1`-`2`

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--ssm_map_statics"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssm_map_statics`

Required:

- `access_list` (String) Access list of ssm groups that should map to the given source
- `address` (String) Source address

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_router_mld_vrf.example "<vrf_name>"
```
